roleset.name: admit
roleset.note: ACKNOWLEDGE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls consider-29.9-1, confess-37.10. Comparison with 'claim'. (from acknowledge.01-v)

ACKNOWLEDGMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry acknowledge.01, OntoNotes grouping acknowledgment-n senses 3,4, 6; maps to VN classes consider-29.9-1, confess-37.10. Framed by Claire. (from acknowledgment.01-n)

role.descr: secondary predication, attribute of arg 1 acknowledged

example.name: acknowledge a sentence
example.text: [Control Data's semiconductor business, VTC Inc., continues to lose money]-1, the executives acknowledged *trace*-1, but they said they consider some of the technology vital to national defense and so are reluctant to dispose of it.

example.name: acknowledge an NP
example.text: *trace*-1 Apparently acknowledging weaker U.S. sales systemwide, [McDonald's]-1 vowed ``to use our size and muscle to do all that is necessary to build the brand.''

example.name: with hearer
example.text: John acknowledged to Mary that he was an idiot.

example.name: with attributive
example.text: John acknowledged Mary as his illegitimate child--a claim she denied vigorously, on the grounds that she's older than he is.

example.name: NP only, args 0 & 1
example.text: the U.S. government 's first acknowledgment of what other groups, such as the International Monetary Fund , have been predictingfor months
example.arg: of what other groups , such as the International Monetary Fund , have been predicting for months

example.name: Arg 1 as "for PP"
example.text: The sales team was sent on a week-long cruise in acknowledgment for their outstanding performance this quarter.
example.arg: for their outstanding performance this quarter

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: John received an acknowledgment from the university that they had received his application.
example.arg: that they had received his application

example.name: Args 0, 1 and modifiers
example.text: I have received no written acknowledgment from the company that they received either my email message or my written letter.
example.arg: that they received either my email message or my written letter.

example.name: Possessive pronoun as arg0
example.text: The first step in treatment is the patient's acknowledgment that there is a problem.

example.name: Arg 1 as "of" PP
example.text: There was no acknowledgment of the fact that he had cheated repeatedly on exams.
example.arg: of the fact that he had cheated repeatedly on exams
